name: PrimeOrbial
detailed_description:
PrimeOrbial is a 3D physics-based action platformer with an infinitely powerful in-game World Creator. Bounce, tether, hover and fly as you discover the endless possibilities of the RainbowVerse. Explore whimsical, hand-crafted environments, build your own worlds or modify existing ones. PrimeOrbial invites you to make your creative dreams come true as you play your way through the unfolding RainbowVerse. You can craft your own beautiful garden or make physics machines that become like giant moving playgrounds!

Features


  • 3D+ Physics Collision Solidity
  • Hyper Realistic Physics and Network Replication of Physics Interactions
  • Coop Online Multiplayer, share experiences with your friends!
  • Explore hand-crafted exotic worlds, and download Community Creations
  • Infinite creative potential with our in-game modding tools!
  • The World Creation Tools enable you to make your 3D Dreams come true
  • Build and share your world creations with others!
  • Change your physical shape to gain new abilities
  • Change your body material to change your physical properties
  • Dynamic platforming using amazing abilities – double jump, tether, fly, hover, stick, bounce
  • Range of difficulty options from first time PC gamer to Renowned RainbowVerse Champion
  • Fast paced frenetic combat for hardcore gamers

Bounce, tether, hover and fly as you discover the endless possibilities of the RainbowVerse. Explore whimsical, hand-crafted environments, build your own worlds or modify existing ones.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Processor Core: i5 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Processor Core: i5 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
